title: Arrange Airport Shuttle Service
description: A hotel guest needs to arrange for the hotel's shuttle service to take them to the airport for their departure.

tasks.description: Identify the guest and their flight departure time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary travel details from the guest.

tasks.description: Check the airport shuttle schedule and recommend a suitable departure time from the hotel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a shuttle time that will get the guest to the airport on time.

tasks.description: Book a spot for the guest on the selected shuttle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves a seat on the shuttle for the guest.
